sentences.en: A few snide comments and you just vanish without a trace or a name?
sentences.cn: 说一些冷嘲热讽的话然后就不留姓名地消逝?
所有的切应力都必须等于零.

sentences.en: All your troubles will vanish away when he returns safely.
sentences.cn: 他平安回来后,你就无忧无虑了.

sentences.en: As a rule , where the broom does not reach the dust will not vanish of itself.
sentences.cn: 扫帚不到,灰尘照例不会自己跑掉.

sentences.en: At equilibrium the resultant of all external forces vanish.
sentences.cn: 在平衡时,所有外力的合力为零.

sentences.en: But the bending moment at the central hinge must vanish.
sentences.cn: 但在中间铰处,弯矩必定为零.

sentences.en: If the circulation vanishes at one instant of time, it must vanish for all times.
sentences.cn: 只要环量在某一瞬间为零, 它就必须永远为零.

sentences.en: My keys were here a minute ago but now they’ve vanished.
sentences.cn: 我的钥匙刚刚还在这里，现在却不翼而飞了。

sentences.en: Obviously they must go to sea and vanish among the innumerable islands.
sentences.cn: 显然,它们必须出海并隐没在无数的岛屿之间.

sentences.en: She seemed to have just vanished into thin air (= suddenly disappeared in a very mysterious way ).

sentences.cn: 那只鸟从视线中消失了。

sentences.en: The clay oxen plunge into the sea and vanish.
The dark clouds hanging over the relations between the two countries will quickly vanish.
sentences.cn: 笼罩着两国关系的阴云会迅速消散.

sentences.en: Want to vanish in your kiss, everyday love you more and more.
sentences.cn: 我想消融在你甜蜜的吻中, 每天都爱你多一些,多一些.

sentences.en: With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish.
sentences.cn: 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了.

sentences.en: With the aggravation of pollution, more fish vanish from the lake.
sentences.cn: 随着污染的加重, 更多的鱼在湖中消亡.

sentences.en: Wonderful dreams may come true or may vanish into thin air.
sentences.cn: 美梦也许会成真,也许会成为泡影.

sentences.en: Zeus: I vanish you to the darkest pits of Tartarus!
sentences.cn: 宙斯: 我要让你在冥界暗无天日的深渊消亡!

words.tran_cn: 难以察觉地；消遁似地；趋于零地

trans.tran_cn: 消失，突然不见，灭绝，不存在
trans.tran_en: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained

trans.tran_cn: 突然消失； 不复存在， 消逝
trans.tran_en: to disappear suddenly, especially in a way that cannot be easily explained
